episode.title: Morning Drops #42 - The Joy Of Learning
episode.description:
Hosted by Yasmin, this Morning Drop explores learning as a lifelong process, focusing on persistence, repetition, and the emotional landscape that comes with challenging oneself over time.

Through personal stories and scientific insights, the episode looks at how learning reshapes the brain, generates joy through effort, and why progress often arrives after confusion and frustration. The episode also questions our cultural relationship with failure and invites a softer, more realistic approach to learning, one that accepts mistakes as part of growth and sees persistence as a quiet form of strength.
